markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Dockhand](/NPCs.aspx?ID=913)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Working to load and unload cargo from ships, dockhands are considered unruly, but many stay focused and work hard until the job is done. Some do celebrate the end of their work day with rowdy drinking.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Laborer_Dockhand.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Dockhand](/NPCs.aspx?ID=913)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 222</row>

**Perception** +3

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +3, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +3, [Labor Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
empty bottle (3), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), whiskey (1 bottle)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bottle +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Heft Crate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The dockhand is adjacent to a crate; **Effect** The dockhand picks up a crate and heaves it up to 15 feet. Upon landing, the crate breaks open in a 5-foot burst. Each creature within the area takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 13 basic Reflex save), and the area becomes difficult terrain until cleared.

**Swig** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The dockhand Interacts to either draw a bottle of alcohol or pick up a nearby unattended bottle of alcohol and drink the whole thing. For 1 minute, the dockhand gains a +2 item bonus to melee damage rolls and saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), but they become [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-188" />
name: Dockhand
